testcase.name: Ensure Deployment has a configured `env` label

failure.message: Missing label object `env` - add a proper environment description (e.g. "prod", "testing", etc.) to the Deployment config

testcase.name: Ensure each container image has a digest tag

failure.message: Incorrect value for key `image` - add a digest tag (starts with `@sha256:`) to represent an immutable version of the image

testcase.name: Ensure each container image has a pinned (tag) version

failure.message: Incorrect value for key `image` - specify an image version to avoid unpleasant "version surprises" in the future

testcase.name: Ensure each container has a configured memory limit

failure.message: Missing property object `limits.memory` - value should be within the accepted boundaries recommended by the organization

testcase.name: Ensure workload has valid label values

failure.message: Incorrect value for key(s) under `labels` - the vales syntax is not valid so the Kubernetes engine will not accept it

testcase.name: Ensure each container has a configured liveness probe

failure.message: Missing property object `livenessProbe` - add a properly configured livenessProbe to catch possible deadlocks
